randgeo
  • Reference
  • Articles
  • News

Random GeoJSON polygon

Random GeoJSON polygon

geo_polygon(count = 1, num_vertices = 10, max_radial_length = 10,
  bbox = NULL)

Arguments

count
(integer/numeric) number of Polygons. Default: 1
num_vertices
(integer/numeric) how many coordinates each polygon will contain. Default: 10
max_radial_length
(integer/numeric) maximum distance that a vertex can reach out of the center of the polygon. Units are in degrees latitude (Approximately 69 miles or 111 km). Default: 10
bbox
(integer/numeric) lat/long bounding box for the centers of the polygons, numeric vector of the form west (long), south (lat), east (long), north (lat). optional

Value

GeoJSON; a list with one ore more Polygons in a FeatureCollection

Examples

geo_polygon()
#> $type
#> [1] "FeatureCollection"
#> 
#> $features
#> $features[[1]]
#> $features[[1]]$type
#> [1] "Feature"
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$type
#> [1] "Polygon"
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]]
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]][[1]]
#> [1] 173.3263 -28.4603
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]][[2]]
#> [1] 178.36201 -26.53098
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]][[3]]
#> [1] -179.34478  -27.23126
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]][[4]]
#> [1] 173.0557 -35.7697
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]][[5]]
#> [1] 172.71655 -29.08057
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]][[6]]
#> [1] 170.79111 -30.07163
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]][[7]]
#> [1] 169.8455 -30.1258
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]][[8]]
#> [1] 165.88489 -30.41804
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]][[9]]
#> [1] 167.57776 -28.30729
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]][[10]]
#> [1] 171.4842 -24.7779
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$geometry$coordinates[[1]][[11]]
#> [1] 173.3263 -28.4603
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> $features[[1]]$properties
#> list()
#> 
#> 
#>

#> [1] "FeatureCollection"
#> 
#> $features
#> $features[[1]]
